title: Couldn't connect to my ranked game no matter what. Can i get some help with this?
body: No matter what I've tried, it kept saying it couldn't reconnect in the loading screen, asking me to retry. I did everything to connect my internet again and again but even when my internet was working, it still told me to reconnect. Because of this, my team lost the game. What the hell was up with it? Does anybody know?

replies.body:
I have no idea, have you tried actually logging out and back in again ?
It happens to me, and this seems to fix it.

If not, it might be a firewall issue but I'm not sure. I feel like that retry button is useless lol.
I know its happening to me, does your screen go all black and you can only see your mouse?
